title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, September 15, 2020
description: On this date in 1963, a bomb killed four girls in the 16th Street Baptist Church in Birmingham, Alabama. The FBI suppressed evidence against the suspected bomber.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1963, a bomb killed four girls in the 16th Street Baptist Church in Birmingham, Alabama. The FBI suppressed evidence against the suspected bomber.
